pullRequest.title: Fix ToggleableKeyBinding differences to vanilla.
pullRequest.bodyText:
A ToggleableKeyBinding can be active (isKeyDown) even when it's conflict context or modifier are not active. Instead those must be checked when the toggle happens.
A symptom of this is the player stopping to sneak while a GUI is open when sneaking-toggle is enabled.
Reported on the forums.

commit.message:
Fix ToggleableKeyBinding differences to vanilla.
A ToggleableKeyBinding can be active (isKeyDown) even when it's conflict context or modifier are not active. Instead those must be checked when the toggle happens

nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't this be public or protected or something given it is in a class and not an interface (if default even works in ATs in interfaces, no idea)
